name: hamiltoncitycommunity.org
description: The website of the Hamilton City Community Services District.

scripts.use:dev: node env/set-environment --dev && echo -n '[firebase] ' && firebase use development
scripts.use:prod: node env/set-environment --prod && echo -n '[firebase] ' && firebase use production
scripts.local: npm run use:dev && firebase serve --port $PORT --host $IP --only hosting
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run use:dev && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:production: npm run use:prod && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
